card.title: Most likely to vote the same

info.lead: List of 5 MPs that most often vote the same as the selected member. MPs are ranked ascending. The lower the value, the bigger the commonalities between the two MPs.
text: We calculate {link} between the results of the MP's voting and everyone else's voting (values of votes are converted to numerical values between -1 and 1).
We calculate the "distance" between all the MPs, rank them based on the results and show the top 5.
